title: This Place: 150 Years Retold
description: In graphic novel format, Indigenous writers explore the untold stories of the past, present, and future in what is now Canada.Explore the last 150 years through the eyes of Indigenous creators in the graphic novel anthology, This Place: 150 Years Retold. Beautifully illustrated, these stories are an emotional and enlightening journey through magic realism, serial killings, psychic battles, and time travel. See how Indigenous peoples have survived a post-apocalyptic world since Contact.This is one of the 200 exceptional projects funded through the Canada Council for the Artsâ€™ New Chapter initiative. With this $35M initiative, the Council supports the creation and sharing of the arts in communities across Canada.
author: Kateri Akiwenzie-Damm
